title: James Blunt attempts to trips up naked man on Celebrity Juice
text:
James was greeted by a naked fan on Celebrity Juice (Picture: ITV)

James Blunt was confronted with the risky challenge of crawling through a naked fan’s legs in the upcoming new series of Celebrity Juice.

The 45-year-old Your Beautiful singer was kept in the dark that his supporter would be coming out into the studio on his birthday suit, with presenter Keith Lemon simply reading out his instructions instead.

‘All you have to do is some roly-polys along here, then through one of your biggest fan’s legs and ring the bell,’ Keith told James as he pointed at the straight-forward assault course.

‘I think you can do it, do you think you can do it?’ he asked.

James replied: ‘I’m going to try my best.’

Keith then introduced the chart-topper to his fan Robbie, who came out completely starkers – except for the rucksack on his back and the aforementioned bell wrapped around, you guessed it, his schlong.

James attempted to go through Robbie’s legs (Picture: ITV)

Now that’s gotta hurt (Picture: ITV)

‘He’s your biggest fan, he’s always talking about you so this is a dream come true,’ Keith managed to say with a completely straight face.

Advertisement

Advertisement

James then attempted the challenge but instead ended tripping Robbie up.

Ouch.

Celebrity Juice has welcomed Mel B as the new team captain, with the Spice Girls singer replacing Paddy McGuinness on the ITV2 series.

‘When I first got offered it I thought Keith was playing a prank on me because I’ve known him for so long,’ Mel admitted.

‘Then I actually got the contract through and I was like, “Of course, I would love to do that show!”’

She continued: ‘It was a no brainer for me. I love the show, I’ve known Keith for a long time and he’s from Leeds so it’s like I’m with my mum, it’s great.’

Mel will be going head-to-head with returning team captain Holly Willoughby and the pair will be battling it out in a number of games with their celebrity guests.

Celebrity Juice returns Thursday at 10pm on ITV2.

Got a showbiz story? If you've got a story, video or pictures get in touch with the Metro.co.uk Entertainment team by emailing us celebtips@metro.co.uk, calling 020 3615 2145 or by visiting our Submit Stuff page - we'd love to hear from you.

description: James Blunt attempts to crawl through naked man's legs but bumps into his manhood on Celebrity Juice
